nodes.bodyText: is there a reason why AbstractWireSerializingTestCase is not preferred? from a bystander's point of view, I see ListCursor is Writeable
This is the one time that we override how the copying is done. I made that method final to make it more clear what is going on. This is the one case of collateral damage.
Is Geometry the only user of this?
right, I suppose the previous comment answers that. guess its surface area is small, but provides enough utility! thanks
